## AspectContext.setArgs() method

Set new arguments for the method execution. This will affect subsequent aspects and the original method.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setArgs(args: any[]): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

args


</td><td>

any\[\]


</td><td>

New arguments array


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Example


```typescript
context.setArgs(['new', 'arguments']);
```
